skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: After signing with A Entertainment in March 2019, B.A.P’s Zelo announced on social media that he and the company have parted ways. In a screenshot shared on Instagram, Zelo stated “My relationship with A Entertainment ended.” The confirmation comes after he hinted that he was no longer part of the company via Instagram stories. Currently, Zelo has posted on social media that he is looking for artists to collaborate with him. One message reads “Beatmakers who are interested in working together on music, please DM me.” If you’re a musician and you live in Korea, you might have a chance to work with Zelo if you message him. Some dreams could come true? By Olivia Murray
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
